pages.text: An aquatic fibre very similar to the kelp on Earth, but with a far more cerulean hue.

It can be found of any of the oceans in the Desolate Lands, and can be smelted into Dried Cobalt Kelp.$(br2)It doesn't look like you can do anything with this Dried Cobalt Kelp yet, however. Except maybe eat it as a little snack.
